description.title: Cost Estimation Documentation, Work Production Project Development, and Estimator Training
description.text: Engineering Business Center provides services for preparing cost estimation documentation, cost estimation services for construction companies in terms of preparing reporting documentation, services for developing work production projects, and educational services for individual, corporate, remote, and group training in cost estimation.

estimateService.title: Cost Estimation Service
estimateService.description: Cost estimation service for construction organizations
content: Preparation of local estimates for general construction and special works
Preparation of work completion acceptance certificates for construction and other special installation works according to forms approved by the Ministry of Architecture and Construction (С-2а, С-2б)
Preparation of certificates of completed works cost and expenses (С-3, С-3а)
Preparation of certificates for additional works

Recalculation of work completion certificates when changing design solutions, in case of adjusting work volumes and costs, adjusting construction cost estimates and re-approving estimate documentation when passing repeated state expertise

Preparation of various forms of accounting documents in construction (С-4, С-7, С-14, С-23), defect reports (С-1) and preparation of report on construction materials consumption in comparison with production standards (С-29)
Preparation of construction contracts, work production and financing schedules, additional agreements, protocols of disagreements
Consulting services on cost estimation pricing within the framework of estimation service

currentRepair.title: Current Repair
content: Preparation of defect reports
Calculation of repair works cost
Preparation of estimates for current repairs
Consultations on repair works
Form С-1 "Defect Report" is subject to application by organizations regardless of organizational and legal form and form of ownership and individual entrepreneurs

Form С-1 is used by organizations to justify the decision to conduct current repairs and serves as the initial document for preparing an estimate for construction and installation works on current repairs

In the corresponding lines of Form С-1, information about constrained and complicated working conditions and features of work technology using lifting mechanisms, electric cradles, auto-towers and other information necessary for determining the estimated cost of works is provided in arbitrary form
Approximate (enlarged) list of expected construction and installation works is indicated in Form С-1 and is compiled based on the results of primary inspection of the repair object

items.name: Cost Estimation Service (PROGRAM 1)
items.description: calculation of contract price for construction contract conclusion and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation for completed works according to agreed list up to 3 objects.

items.name: Cost Estimation Service (PROGRAM 2)
items.description: calculation of contract price for construction contract conclusion and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation for completed works according to agreed list from 3 objects.

items.name: Cost Estimation Service (PAY AS YOU GO)
items.description: subscription cost estimation service based on actual hours worked according to agreed list: calculation of contract price for construction contract conclusion and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation.

training.title: Training
training.subtitle: Professional courses in cost estimation and pricing

sections.title: 1. Basics of Estimating
content: Determining the estimated cost of construction objects
Regulatory bases for determining construction costs
Procedure for determining the estimated cost of a construction object and preparing estimate documentation based on resource consumption standards in natural terms NRR 2017

sections.title: 2. Resource Consumption Standards
content: Resource consumption standards in natural terms
Procedure for applying resource consumption standards
Resource consumption standards for dismantling and demolition
Features of applying resource consumption standards for equipment installation
Costs for equipment dismantling works

sections.title: 3. Cost Calculation
content: Procedure for calculating current labor costs
Calculation of construction materials costs
Calculation of construction machinery operation costs
Inter-category calculation coefficients for determining labor costs
Impact of complicated and constrained working conditions

sections.title: 4. Additional Expenses
content: Procedure for determining transportation costs
Construction zones
General business and general production expenses
Planned profit
Funds for construction of temporary buildings and structures

sections.title: 5. Special Conditions
content: Funds for additional expenses during construction and installation works in winter
Part I - standards by construction types
Part II - standards by structures and work types

sections.title: 6. Other Works and Expenses
content: Funds related to social insurance contributions
Funds to cover expenses related to traveling nature of works
Funds for contractor's workers business trips

sections.title: 7. Workers Business Trips
content: Methodological recommendations for calculating business trip funds
Amounts of expense reimbursement for business trips
Number of business trip construction workers and machine operators
Standard labor intensity of works
Conditional example of calculating funds for workers business trips

sections.title: 8. Taxes and Contributions
content: Taxes and contributions
Funds considering the application of forecast price indices
Deviation in materials cost

sections.title: 9. Estimate Documentation
content: Composition of estimate documentation
Procedure for preparing local estimates
Formation of information data block
Grouping data in local estimates by design and technological modules (PTM)
Preparation of object estimates and summary estimate calculation

sections.title: 10. Construction Documentation
content: Main forms of accounting documents:
Form С-1 - Report on completed works
Form С-2а - Work completion acceptance certificates
Form С-2б - Installation work completion acceptance certificates
Form С-3 - Certificate of completed works cost
Form С-3а - Certificate of completed works cost and expenses
Form С-4 - Report on main materials consumption
Form С-7 - Report on materials consumption
Form С-14 - Report on fuel consumption

sections.title: 11. Contractual Relations
content: Ensuring contractor's obligations fulfillment
Customer's supply materials
Customer's, contractor's and subcontractor's supply equipment
Procedure for forming unchanged contract price
Cases of contract price changes

sections.title: 12. Commissioning Works
content: Procedure for determining estimated cost of commissioning works
Example of calculating estimated cost of commissioning works
Report on construction materials consumption (Form С-29)

sections.title: 13. Comparative Analysis
content: Comparative analysis of NRR 2012 and NRR 2017
Ways to reduce construction costs
Forming contract price by local estimates and PTM

sections.title: 14. Regulatory Base
content: MAiS Instruction No. 29 on filling out acceptance certificate forms
MAiS Resolution of 07.02.2019 N 9 on man-hour rate
Analysis of tender documentation

sections.title: 1. Brief Overview
content: Rules for determining estimated cost of construction and preparing estimate documentation based on resource consumption standards in natural terms in NRR 2012 and 2017, including formation of individual cost items:
Labor costs of workers and machine operators
Costs for construction materials and construction machinery operation, transportation costs
General business and general production expenses and planned profit
Impact of complicated and constrained working conditions
Funds for construction of temporary buildings and structures and funds for additional expenses during construction and installation works in winter
Other works and expenses
Funds considering the application of forecast price indices in construction, taxes and contributions

sections.title: 2. Comparative Analysis of Standards
content: Comparative analysis of NRR 2012 and NRR 2017
Main changes and differences
Practical application of standards

sections.title: 3. Estimate Documentation
content: Composition of estimate documentation
Formation of information data block
Grouping data in local estimates by design and technological modules (PTM)

sections.title: 4. Procurement in Construction
content: Procurement of goods (works, services) during construction
Procedure for conducting procurement
Requirements for procurement participants

sections.title: 5. Contract Price Formation
content: Procedure for forming unchanged contract price for construction objects
Customer's price
Contractor's offer price
Cases of contract price changes during construction of objects financed fully or partially from budgets and other sources
Contractor's savings

sections.title: 6. Additional Works
content: Procedure for forming cost of additional works
Features of accounting for additional works in estimate documentation

sections.title: 7. Accounting Documentation
content: Main forms of accounting documents in construction:
Form С-2а - Work completion acceptance certificates
Form С-2б - Installation work completion acceptance certificates
Form С-3а - Certificate of completed works cost and expenses
Recommendations for forms application and filling

sections.title: 8. Competitive Tenders
content: Analysis of tender documentation
Determining procedure for forming contract price for tender proposal

sections.title: 9. Cost Optimization
content: Ways to reduce construction costs
Forming contract price by local estimates and design and technological modules (PTM)

sections.title: 10. Regulatory Base
content: Procedure for application and filling of forms of acceptance certificates for completed construction and other special installation works (С-2а and С-2б)
MAiS Instruction No. 29
